General.Name: China Railway Special Cargo Logistics Co. Ltd.
General.Description: China Railway Special Cargo Logistics Co., Ltd. provides railway cargo transportation and logistics services in China. The company operates through Commodity Automobile Logistics, Cold Chain Logistics, and Oversized Cargo Logistics segments. It transports commodity vehicles, refrigerated goods, transformers, generator stators, rotors, engineering machineries, machinery parts, long rails, long steel plates, prefabricated beams, aerospace equipment, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: China Railway Business Building, Beijing, China, 100055
